mapper.select: SELECT si.id, si.sku_name AS title, si.price, si.sku_default_img AS default_img, bt.id AS tm_id, bt.tm_name, bt.logo_url AS tm_logo_url, c1.id as category1_id, c1.`name` as category1_name, c2.id as category2_id, c2.`name` as category2_name, c3.id as category3_id, c3.`name` as category3_name, 0 as hot_score, bi.id as attr_id, bi.attr_name, bv.value_name as attr_value FROM sku_info si, sku_attr_value sav, base_attr_info bi, base_attr_value bv, base_trademark bt, base_category1 c1, base_category2 c2, base_category3 c3 WHERE si.id = sav.sku_id AND sav.attr_id = bi.id AND bi.id = bv.attr_id AND si.tm_id = bt.id and c3.id = si.category3_id and c1.id = c2.category1_id and c2.id = c3.category2_id and si.id = #{skuId}

SELECT skv.sku_id, GROUP_CONCAT(skv.sale_attr_value_id ORDER BY sav.base_sale_attr_id, skv.sale_attr_value_id SEPARATOR '|') as AttrValueIds FROM sku_sale_attr_value skv,spu_sale_attr_value sav WHERE sav.id = skv.sale_attr_value_id and skv.spu_id = sav.spu_id and skv.spu_id = #{spuId} GROUP BY skv.sku_id ORDER BY sav.base_sale_attr_id,skv.sku_id
